summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017. It details the account balance, service charges, and withdrawal transactions, indicating a business banking relationship managed by Carlo Gonzales.

persons.name: Carlo Gonzales
persons.context: Carlo Gonzales is identified as the relationship manager for the account held by Shocker Holdings LLC.

keyFacts: The bank statement covers the period from November 1, 2017, to November 30, 2017.
The account belongs to Shocker Holdings LLC.
The beginning balance was $1,921.43, with a service charge of $20.00 applied on November 10, 2017.
The ending balance for the period was $1,901.43.
The document indicates that the standard monthly service charge was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
